unnormalised: Hey there, social media buffs! Ever feel like you're chasing virality? Well, you're not alone. This week's virality trends are wilder than a Delhi wedding procession.
normalised: Hey there, social media buffs! Ever feel like you're chasing virality? Well, you're not alone. This week's virality trends are wilder than a Delhi wedding procession.

unnormalised: From hilarious reels of auntyji's dance-offs to inspiring stories of rickshaw walas acing IIT-JEE prep (seriously!), the content landscape is buzzing. Experts at IIM Ahmedabad are even analyzing what makes a post go "Chak De! India" level viral.
normalised: From hilarious reels of auntyji's dance-offs to inspiring stories of rickshaw walas acing I I T-J E E prep (seriously!), the content landscape is buzzing. Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are even analyzing what makes a post go "Chak De! India" level viral.

unnormalised: One major takeaway? Authenticity is king (or should we say, 'maharaja'?). Forget staged scenarios, people are loving raw, relatable content. Think impromptu chai sessions at a dhabha captured on shaky cam.
normalised: One major takeaway? Authenticity is king (or should we say, 'maharaja'?). Forget staged scenarios, people are loving raw, relatable content. Think impromptu chai sessions at a dhabha captured on shaky cam.

unnormalised: But here’s the catch: what’s trending now, might be yesterday's samosa by 14/10/2024. Staying ahead requires constant adaptation. Remember that "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha?" meme? Ancient history!
normalised: But here’s the catch: what’s trending now, might be yesterday's samosa by fourteenth October two thousand and twenty four. Staying ahead requires constant adaptation. Remember that "Rasode Mein Kaun Tha?" meme? Ancient history!

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled for new trends popping up around Diwali on 01/11/2024 and even post them at strategic times like 18:00 hrs for max engagement. This week's viral star, Priya Sharma, attributes her success to "just being herself" and posting consistently. So ditch the filters, embrace your inner desi, and get creating! Who knows, your content could be the next big thing.
normalised: Keep your eyes peeled for new trends popping up around Diwali on first November two thousand and twenty four and even post them at strategic times like eighteen hundred hours for max engagement. This week's viral star, Priya Sharma, attributes her success to "just being herself" and posting consistently. So ditch the filters, embrace your inner desi, and get creating! Who knows, your content could be the next big thing.
